**Customizable Lenses**: Incorporate interchangeable lenses with different colors and tints to cater to various lighting conditions and personal preferences. This would make the sunglasses more versatile and appealing to a wider range of users.

**Integrated Fitness Tracker**: Incorporate a fitness tracker into the sunglasses to monitor physical activity, heart rate, and other health metrics. This would encourage users to stay active while they're outdoors and provide valuable health data.

**Solar Charging**: Include solar panels in the sunglasses to harness the power of the sun and keep the battery charged. This would eliminate the need for a traditional charging method and make the sunglasses more eco-friendly.

**Augmented Reality (AR) Integration**: Incorporate AR technology into the sunglasses to provide users with an immersive experience. This could include information about their surroundings, virtual shopping, or even augmented sports training.

**Smart Glasses with Adjustable Frames**: Design the sunglasses with adjustable frames that can be tailored to the user's face shape and comfort preferences. This would improve the fit and comfort of the sunglasses, ensuring they stay in place during high-energy activities.
